title: Update Portfolio projects dataset to 10 professional service entries with live links

requirements.summary: Replace the Portfolio projects static dataset with exactly 10 professional service projects, each with required fields and valid https live links.
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/src/data/projects.ts` exports an array of exactly 10 projects.
Each of the 10 projects contains `title`, `description`, `category`, `tools` (non-empty array), and `link` (non-empty string).
All project `category` values match one of the existing filter categories: `legal`, `business`, `marketing`, `design`, `video`, `web`.
Each project `link` is a valid absolute URL (starts with `https://`).

file_operations.description: Update the Project type to require `link: string` (not optional) and replace the exported `projects` array with exactly 10 generated professional service project entries, ensuring every entry includes title/description/category/tools (non-empty)/link (non-empty, starts with https://) and categories only from: legal, business, marketing, design, video, web.

requirements.summary: Ensure the Portfolio UI renders 10 project cards and each card shows an external link icon opening the live link in a new tab with safe rel attributes.
acceptanceCriteria: On `/portfolio`, the Projects grid renders 10 project cards when the filter is set to “All Projects”.
Every project card shows a clickable external link icon.
Clicking the external link icon opens the project `link` in a new browser tab and preserves `rel="noopener noreferrer"` behavior.

file_operations.description: Adjust the project card rendering so every project always displays a clickable ExternalLink icon (since `link` is required), keeping `target="_blank"` and `rel="noopener noreferrer"`; continue using shadcn-ui Card/Badge primitives for consistent styling (Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing).

Confirm the Portfolio page passes the full `projects` list to ProjectsGrid when the selected category is `all`, ensuring the UI renders all 10 cards under “All Projects” without introducing new routes or pages.

requirements.summary: Preserve existing Portfolio category filtering behavior with the new 10 projects.
acceptanceCriteria: Selecting each category tab (Legal/Business/Marketing/Design/Video/Web) filters the grid to only projects whose `category` matches the selected tab value.
Selecting “All Projects” shows all 10 projects again.

file_operations.description: Keep filtering logic based on the selected tab value so that non-`all` selections filter by exact category match, and `all` restores the full set of 10 projects.

Ensure the category tab values remain exactly aligned with the allowed dataset categories (legal, business, marketing, design, video, web) plus `all`, preserving the existing tab-driven filtering UX; uses shadcn-ui Tabs components (Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing).
